remarks: The closest one can get to ~ isset without using ~ ax-ext .  See also ~ bj-vexw .  Note that the only dv condition is between ` y ` and ` A ` .  (Contributed by BJ, 29-Apr-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
bj-issetw.1 $e |- ph $.
bj-issetw $p |- ( A e. { x | ph } <-> E. y y = A ) $.
$d A y $.
